### Tender Status

### Procurement Description
Transport Canada is seeking qualified consultants to provide professional services under Stream 2 – Business Consulting / Change Management. The following Supply Arrangement holders under E60ZT-18TSPS have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. and Randstad Interim Inc
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Deloitte Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* iFathom Corporation
* IPSS INC.
* KPMG LLP
* KSAR & ASSOCIATES INC
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* NATTIQ INC.
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Technomics, Incorporated
* TRM Technologies Inc.

### Category Details
The following categories are of interest:

2.1 Business Analyst:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
2.3 Business Consultant:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
2.4 Organization Development Consultant:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
2.5 Business Process Consultant:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
2.7 Needs Analysis and Research Consultant:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
2.8 Business Architect:
	* 2-Junior, 2-Intermediate and 1-Senior level
